uk.ac.open.kmi.iserve.rest.discovery

Interface OperationDiscoveryPlugin

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DiscoveryPlugin

    public interface OperationDiscoveryPlugin
extends DiscoveryPlugin
    Interface that Operation Discovery Plugins should implement
    Author:
    Carlos Pedrinaci (Knowledge Media Institute - The Open University)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<URL,MatchResult> discoverOperations(javax.ws.rs.core.MultivaluedMap<String,String> parameters)
      Discover matching operations based on the key-value pairs providing values for the plugin discovery parameters.

      • Methods inherited from interface uk.ac.open.kmi.iserve.rest.discovery.DiscoveryPlugin

        getDescription, getFeedTitle, getName, getParametersDetails, getVersion

    • Method Detail

      • discoverOperations

        Map<URL,MatchResult> discoverOperations(javax.ws.rs.core.MultivaluedMap<String,String> parameters)
                                 throws DiscoveryException
        Discover matching operations based on the key-value pairs providing values for the plugin discovery parameters. The results are indexed by the URL of the matching result in order to better support merging results
        Parameters:
        parameters - the invocation parameters for the discovery plugin. These parameters are plugin dependent DiscoveryPlugin
        Returns:
        the matching results not necessarily ordered. The ordering shall take place at a later stage prior to returning the results.
        Throws:
        DiscoveryException
